annotation.spannedText: It's fine to have the shingles vaccine if you've already had shingles

classMention.mentionClass: It's fine to have the shingles vaccine if you've already had shingles

annotation.spannedText: The shingles vaccine works very well in people who have had shingles before and it will boost your immunity against further shingles attacks

classMention.mentionClass: The shingles vaccine works very well in people who have had shingles before and it will boost your immunity against further shingles attacks

annotation.spannedText: If you are worried that you may miss out on the shingles vaccination, contact your GP surgery to arrange an appointment to have the vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: If you are worried that you may miss out on the shingles vaccination, contact your GP surgery to arrange an appointment to have the vaccine

annotation.spannedText: There is lots of evidence showing that the shingles vaccine is very safe

classMention.mentionClass: There is lots of evidence showing that the shingles vaccine is very safe

annotation.spannedText: The vaccine also has few side effects

classMention.mentionClass: The vaccine also has few side effects
